examples.example: 掌握一门外语会给我们的生活带来很多便利。

translate.english: Mastering a foreign language will bring a lot of convenience to our life.

examples.example: 我正在努力学习一门新的艺术，让自己的生活更加丰富多彩。

translate.english: I am trying hard to learn a new art to make my life more rich and colorful.

examples.example: 我渴望掌握一门精湛的技艺，为自己的人生增添光彩。

translate.english: I am eager to master an exquisite skill to add luster to my life.
